item.title: My Current Dev Setup and Activity
item.author: mdwyer
item.description: My current setup The last several months have seen me moving around.. A lot (thanks COVID).. But after hunting around for furniture due to a shortage of standing desks, I’ve finalised my setup – and thank god. Setup It’s been great to revive my Ultrawide and laptop in a fairly minimalist setup. This is my primary dev machine which, if you see my GitHub, has caused no end of issues with running Linux (#YearOfTheLinuxDesktop) in the 2 years I’ve had it.
